string.text: A que le debo este placer?
Que esta buscando un novato como tu en la finca de Guardabosques?
Fue la casualidad la que te trajo a mi?
Buena suerte, hijo!
No te olvides de mi!
Acuerdate bien de mi!
Quien eres?

¿Qué puedo decirle sobre mí? I'm Forester. I've been here a long time; I've spent my whole life living next to this forest. I'm old. A mi edad, te apegas a tu lugar de residencia, sin importar de qué se trate. Me negué a ser evacuado después del accidente en la planta de energía, y también sobreviví a la aparición de la Zona. I remember a flash on the horizon... Many folks died that day, but the Zone spared me, you see? Heck, it didn't just spare me, it gave me a gift! I used to be able to find paths in the forest, and now I can feel out a safe path through deadly anomalies. Stalkers envy me, but I can't say I'm all that happy about my gift. Debes entender que todo tiene un precio. Algún día, la Zona se tomará el pago de este obsequio. That's what I am afraid of, buddy.

No, este era tu típico bosque de pinos. Bueno, también era una reserva natural, pero eso era lo único especial por aquel entonces. Se puso rojo después del accidente en la central nuclear de Chernobyl en 1986. Estaba verde cuando me acosté, y cuando me desperté era como lo ves ahora. Entonces apareció la Zona, y los animales y pájaros abandonaron este bosque. Yo era el único ser viviente que se quedaba atrás. Solo yo, un bosque rojo, y esta niebla espesa que nunca se aclara.

Sí, muchos a stalkers les ha llegado aquí su fin. I've even heard rumours that an evil spirit lives in the Red Forest. Tal como lo veo, este bosque es como todo lo demás en la Zona. If you treat it right, it won't touch you. The trouble is, you stalkers don't treat anything right. You seek to own parts of the Zone, and in return, you get... what you're due.
Háblame sobre el Bosque Rojo.

Esto solía ser una reserva de vida silvestre, y yo era el guarda forestal local. Protegía el bosque y sus animales de los cazadores furtivos. Ahora, la Zona misma protege este lugar, y lo hace tan bien que las personas están dispuestas a viajar una docena de kilómetros adicionales solo para evitarlo. If a stranger sets his foot in the forest, he's as good as dead. I may be Forester, but even I don't know exactly what goes on here. Un hombre entra en la niebla y se deja llevar por la nada. Podrías estar caminando justo detrás de él y aún no saber cómo se encontró con su final. So that's that, sonny.
¿Qué puedes decirme sobre la Zona?

The Zone, heh... The Zone has a life of its own, and we people just get in its way; some more, some less. La Zona trabaja para neutralizar cualquier riesgo para su existencia de la misma manera en que nuestro cuerpo combate las enfermedades. Tenemos fiebre, y la Zona también tiene temblores. Emissions... Now, those are a way to 'barf' us up. Ahora, esas son sus formas de "vomitarnos". Mientras más molestias le causamos, más fuertes son las nuevas emisiones.
¿Cómo sobreviviste aquí todos estos años, solo y en medio de todos estos peligros?

One foolish action can destroy the Zone... along with everything that belongs to it. Not just mutants and anomalies, but also artefacts and you stalkers... and me. Puedo sentir que la Zona está profundamente preocupada; algo la está trastornando, perturbando su equilibrio. A storm is brewing... and I don't know if the status quo can be preserved.
Estoy buscando a alguien que pueda contarme más sobre la Zona. Dime abuelo, sabes algo que me pueda servir?

Hmm... you're quite ambitious, aren't you? Reminds me of all those stalkers who came here seeking the unknown, poor souls... \nMany years ago, an old pal of mine used to travel with a certain group. One of them has made it to the deepest side of the Zone. He should be the one you're seeking. If my memory didn't betray me, he settled in the Great Swamps along with his dog.
Perfecto, gracias por la información.
Cuidado con lo que deseas, joven.
Guardabosques, necesito cruzar el puente de Limansk.
Cruzar el puente, dices? Por que no vas a hablar con los que vigilan el puente?
Puede que lo hayas olvidado, pero es gracias a ti que Limansk ahora esta repleta de mercenarios.
No lo he olvidado, pero tampoco recibirás ninguna ayuda de mi parte. Todavia no estoy seguro si hice lo correcto al ayudar a esos mercenarios.
Listen, you need to help me. What does it matter if you did the right thing or not? In any case, I can find out if I'll be able to reach the city.
Si no me cuentas todo ahora mismo, recibirás un pase gratis para la morgue.
Viejo, si la Zona me quiere en Limansk, llegare alli. Te conviene ayudarme, a ver si te va a pasar algo malo.

...I saw something in Scar - the Zone needed him. You, however... Yes, I'd like to know what happened to him. So, listen: we helped the mercenary detachment get out of the space anomaly. Once everything was settled, they paid me a visit. Looks like one of them snitched on me, told them I also took part in the rescue. I spoke to their leader, Leshiy, who gave me some provisions, money and ammunition - then he went on his way. In his own words, he headed off to the Army Warehouses - to Freedom. You can go look for him there - several years have passed, but judging by our conversation, his intentions to join them were serious.
A que lugares puedo viajar, hermano?
I can not escort you personally, but our brothers may show you where to go - for a fee. We've got positions set up in the Red Forest, Jupiter and Pripyat. We would be glad to assist you at any time.
A donde me pueden llevar los guias?
Al Bosque Rojo por cinco mil rublos, Jupiter por dos mil y Pripyat por mil.
Me gustaria viajar a un sitio especifico.
Claro que si. A donde te gustaria que te llevaran los guias?
Al Bosque Rojo. %c[d_orange][5000 RU]
A Jupiter. %c[d_orange][2000 RU]
A Pripyat. %c[d_orange][1000 RU]
He cambiado de opinion.
Come, brother. I'll make sure you can serve the Zone well.

If you need equipment, I can provide. I don't merely collect and manage the gear that our brave crusaders take from fallen enemies. No, no, no, throughout the years I have established many contacts with outside suppliers. You see, brother, others may not understand the magnificence of the Zone, disagree with the justness of our cause, even want us dead... but as soon as they recognise a chance to make profits, they're more than willing to cooperate. And I'm more than willing to exploit their flaws to our advantage. While they provide us with the tools required to realise our vision of Vyraj, all they gain in return is digits, metal disks, and scraps of paper. Ironic, isn't it?
There is more than meets the eye to the Zone.

I'm forever but a humble servant. You know, brother, I used to work as an engineer for the Masters even before the Zone was created. I was one of the many who assembled the venerable Generators, with no authority to speak of, and a small, but important role to play in the Zone's creation. When the Masters ascended to Vyraj and our Father, Chernobog, was let loose to carry out their will, he recruited me into the ranks of newborn Sin in recognition of my part in the mission and mechanical skills. Nowadays, I toil constantly to maintain the equipment of our crusaders in satisfactory condition, so that they can carry out the will of Masters as well.
